mapper.select: SELECT '出库' as kind, sum(out_qty) AS qty, substring(out_createtime, 1, 10) AS time FROM w_outstock WHERE out_createtime BETWEEN '2019-09-02' AND '2019-09-14' GROUP BY substring(out_createtime, 1, 10) DESC LIMIT 0,12

SELECT '入库' as kind, sum(in_qty) AS qty, substring(in_createtime, 1, 10) AS time FROM w_instock WHERE in_createtime BETWEEN '2019-09-02' AND '2019-09-14' GROUP BY substring(in_createtime, 1, 10) DESC LIMIT 0,12

SELECT '总收入' as kind, sum(out_profit) AS qty, substring(out_createtime, 1, 10) AS time FROM w_outstock WHERE out_createtime BETWEEN '2019-09-02' AND '2019-09-14' GROUP BY substring(out_createtime, 1, 10) DESC LIMIT 0,12

SELECT '总支出' as kind, sum(in_qty*in_cost) AS qty, substring(in_createtime, 1, 10) AS time FROM w_instock WHERE in_createtime BETWEEN '2019-09-02' AND '2019-09-14' GROUP BY substring(in_createtime, 1, 10) DESC LIMIT 0,12
